args.name: ...tag
args.description: If set, only the records with specified tags will be removed

subcommands.name: lint/latte
subcommands.description: Lint check all template files in the template directory

args.name: command
args.description: A command to get information about.

subcommands.name: results/load
subcommands.description: Imports all results from a given directory.

subcommands.name: games/sync
subcommands.description: Synchronize not synchronized games from DB to public API.

args.name: limit
args.description: Maximum number of games to synchronize

subcommands.name: autocomplete/get
subcommands.description: Generate an autocomplete JSON for all available commands.

args.name: out
args.description: If set, output will be written to the [out] file. Otherwise, output will be written to stdout.

subcommands.name: translations/removeComments
subcommands.description: Remove all comments from translation files.

subcommands.name: translations/merge
subcommands.description: Merge translations from this and one other project.

args.name: dir
args.description: A language directory from the other project.

args.name: contextSkip
args.description: A comma separated list of context names to skip while merging.
